thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 16 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Wanda Hotel Development Co Sells 60 Pct Stake In Wanda International Real Estate Investment Co

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Wanda Hotel Development Co Sells 60 Pct Stake In Wanda International Real Estate Investment Co

organizations.name: wanda international real estate investment co

text:
Jan 16 (Reuters) - Wanda Hotel Development Co Ltd:
* DEAL FOR GBP35.6 MILLION ‍​ * ANNOUNCES DISPOSAL OF LONDON PROPERTY PROJECT * SELLS 60 PERCENT STAKE IN WANDA INTERNATIONAL REAL ESTATE INVESTMENT CO
* ‍DISPOSAL IS EXPECTED TO GIVE RISE TO A GAIN OF ABOUT HK$434 MILLION​
* SAYS DEAL INCLUDES ‍DEBT OF £159.5 MILLION (ABOUT HK$1.68 BILLION)​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
